name: picoshare
description: PicoShare is a self-hosted file sharing app designed for minimal configuration. It supports drag-and-drop uploads, shareable links, and expiration controls with a clean UI.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload files by dragging them into the browser for quick sharing

features.title: Shareable Links
features.description: Generate unique URLs for each uploaded file to share with others

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure file links with passwords to restrict access to authorized users

features.title: Download Tracking
features.description: Monitor how many times files have been downloaded and by whom

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: View, organize, and delete uploaded files through a clean web interface

features.title: Storage Limits
features.description: Configure maximum file sizes and total storage quotas per user or globally

features.title: Guest Uploads
features.description: Allow anonymous users to upload files without creating accounts
